description: Bug fix release for HBase-1.0 branch

issues.title: Use zookeeper multi to clear znodes
[0.98] Backport HBASE-12867 - Shell does not support custom replication endpoint specification
Remove HTablePool from thrift-server
Make Bytes$LexicographicalComparerHolder$UnsafeComparer::compareTo inlineable
Remove MVCC stamps from HFile when that is safe
Add missing table owner to AC tests.
Avoid isCellTTLExpired() for NO-TAG cases
Improve the test run time for TestAccessController class
Partially revert HBASE-13172
Doc how the oddball HTable methods getStartKey, getEndKey, etc. will be removed in 2.0.0
work around jdk8 spec bug in WALPerfEval
Cherry-pick addendums to HBASE-13084
remove unused bundled dependencies
ensure correct ASF policy compliant headers on source/docs
Add vectorportal.com to NOTICES.txt as src of our logo
Add shell tests for Snapshot
Add missing headers to META-INF files
Use getVisibleLength public api from HdfsDataInputStream from Hadoop-2.
Coprocessor failure during batchmutation leaves the memstore datastructs in an inconsistent state
TestReplicationThrottler.testThrottling failed on virtual boxes
Mismatch in the equals and hashcode methods of KeyValue
[ITBLL] Master fails rejoining cluster stuck splitting logs; Distributed log replay=true
WALs may be deleted before they are replicated to peers
Invalid FQCNs in alter table command leaves the table unusable
Improper configuration can leads to endless lease recovery during failover
Procedure fails due to ZK issue
SmallScannerCallable does not increment scan metrics
Protocol Buffers 2.5 no longer available for download on code.google.com
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in CellComparator#getMinimumMidpointArray
Renew Scanner Lease without advancing the RegionScanner
Add hbase.import.version to Import usage.
Canary may generate false alarm on the first region when there are many delete markers
batchCoprocessorService() does not handle NULL keys
HFiles that are in use by a table cloned from a snapshot may be deleted when that snapshot is deleted
ThriftServer leaks ZooKeeper connections
Fix a possible infinite loop in doMiniBatchMutation
ShortCircuitConnection doesn't short-circuit all calls as expected
NullPointerException in TagRewriteCell
TestRegionServerReportForDuty can be flaky: hang or timeout
The default value for hbase.client.scanner.max.result.size is never actually set on Scans
A bug on selecting compaction pool
NPE on region server status page if all masters are down
StackServlet produces 500 error
ITBLL.Verify doesn't actually evaluate counters after job completes
Master MBeans are not published
HRegionFileSystem#splitStoreFile() finishes without closing the file handle in some situation
[WINDOWS] hbase.cmd script is broken
check_compatibility.sh should ignore shaded jars
Connection leak during log splitting
bin/hbase mapredcp does not include yammer-metrics jar
413 Error with Stargate through Knox, using AD, SPNEGO, and Pre-Auth
update clover to work for current versions
TestRegionFavoredNodes doesn't guard against setup failure
ReplicationSource is too eager to remove sinks
Use HDFS for HFileOutputFormat2 partitioner's path
Use AtomicLong as size in BoundedConcurrentLinkedQueue
Backport HBASE-13368 to branch-1 and 0.98
Regions stuck in transition because master is incorrectly assumed dead
Put copy constructor is shallow
Default value for hbase.client.operation.timeout is too high
RSRpcService.scan() throws an OutOfOrderScannerNext if the scan has a retriable failure
Use HBase 1.0 interfaces in ConnectionCache
TestFlushRegionEntry is flaky
ReplicateContext should not be a member of ReplicationSource
Updates to meta table server columns may be eclipsed
Provide an API to set min and max versions in HColumnDescriptor
TestBoundedRegionGroupingProvider#setMembershipDedups need to set HDFS diretory for WAL
Improve shell scan performances when using LIMIT
In table.rb scanners are never closed.
Codehaus repository is out of service
Old hbase.regionserver.global.memstore.upperLimit and lowerLimit properties are ignored if present
TestReplicationAdmin should clean up MiniZKCluster resource
Improper timestamp checking with VisibilityScanDeleteTracker
list_replicated_tables command is not listing table in hbase shell.
Allow ZKAclReset to set and not just clear ZK ACLs
ZooKeeper znodes are bootstrapped with insecure ACLs in a secure configuration
Setting illegal versions for HColumnDescriptor does not throw IllegalArgumentException
Table fragmentation display triggers NPE on master status page
Calling table.exists() before table.get() end up with an empty Result
ForeignException should not be sent to the client
Hadoop src checksum is shown instead of HBase src checksum in master / RS UI
TestRowTooBig should use HDFS directory for its region directory
Deleting of last Column Family of a table should not be allowed
WARN if hbase.bucketcache.percentage.in.combinedcache is set
Use ProtobufUtil#mergeFrom and ProtobufUtil#mergeDelimitedFrom in place of builder methods of same name
Unable to create table when group acls are appropriately set.
LoadIncrementalHFile.doBulkLoad(Path,HTable) doesn't handle unmanaged connections when using SecureBulkLoad
Evict count not properly passed to HeapMemoryTuner.
KeyValueHeap.current might be in heap when exception happens in pollRealKV
RpcClientImpl.close() can hang with cancelled replica RPCs
ITBLL improvements after HBASE-13811
BucketCacheTmpl.jamon has wrong bucket free and used labels
Multi-wal feature breaks reported number and size of HLogs
Increase the default value for hbase.hregion.memstore.block.multipler from 2 to 4 (part 2)
LoadTestTool addAuthInfoToConf throws UnsupportedOperationException
Clock skew between master and region server may render restored region without server address
Interrupt to flush from TableFlushProcedure causes dataloss in ITBLL
Set hbase.fs.tmp.dir config in HBaseTestingUtility.java for Phoenix UT to use
Bug in HTable#incrementColumnValue implementation
ZK watches leaks during snapshots
Scanner with all results filtered out results in NPE
Error while calling watcher on creating and deleting an HBase table
TestAssignmentManager.testBalanceOnMasterFailoverScenarioWithOfflineNode failing consistently on branch-1.1
TestRecoveredEdits.testReplayWorksThoughLotsOfFlushing failing consistently on branch-1.1
Loaded region coprocessors are not reported in shell status command
DBE's seekBefore with tags corrupts the tag's offset information thus leading to incorrect results
Orphaned namespace table ZK node should not prevent master to start
Deletes done during the region merge transaction may get eclipsed
Prefix_Tree seekBefore() does not work correctly
RESTApiClusterManager calls kill() instead of suspend() and resume()
Region splitting uses a single thread in most common cases
AuthenticationTokenSecretManager is never stopped in RPCServer
Add exception handler for lease thread
Threshold for combined MemStore and BlockCache percentages is not checked
ServerName is not fully case insensitive
Set permission to .top hfile in LoadIncrementalHFiles
Fix FATAL level logging in FSHLog where logged for non fatal exceptions
NPE in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RpcServer$Connection.readAndProcess
Acknowledged writes may get lost if regionserver clock is set backwards
Remove unnecessary draw of system entropy from RecoverableZooKeeper
Once replication sees an error it slows down forever
StackOverflowError in reverse scan
regionserver blocks because of waiting for offsetLock
Thrift server idle connection timeout issue
TestShell visibility tests failing
list_labels shouldn't raise ArgumentError if no labels are defined
Fix coprocessor handling of duplicate classes
Close BufferedMutator and connection in MultiTableOutputFormat
Fix deadlock during cluster shutdown due to concurrent connection close
Incorrect NOTICE file in hbase-it test-jar
branch-1.1 hbase-server test-jar has incorrect LICENSE
javadoc jars use LICENSE/NOTICE from primary artifact
TableSnapshotInputFormat should not create back references when restoring snapshot
Provide client utility to easily enable and disable table replication
Add add(byte[][] arrays) to Bytes.
region_mover#isSuccessfulScan may be extremely slow on region with lots of expired data
Add timeouts on all tests so less zombie sightings
Change BufferedMutatorExample to use addColumn() since add() is deprecated
Add enforcer rule that matches our JDK support statement
Throw DoNotRetryIOException instead of read only IOException
RegionEnvironment.offerExecutionLatency Blocks Threads under Heavy Load
Allow to skip store file range check based on column family while creating reference files in HRegionFileSystem#splitStoreFile
[Shell] Support unset of a list of table attributes
Optimize FuzzyRowFilter
Default to 700 for HDFS root dir permissions for secure deployments
Add group permissions testing coverage to AC.
Run MiniCluster on top of other MiniDfsCluster
Use zookeeper multi to clear znodes in ZKProcedureUtil
Log link to client scan troubleshooting section when scanner exceptions happen.
don't build javadocs for hbase-protocol module
TestFastFail is still failing
TestTableLockManager#testLockTimeoutException fails in 0.98 and 1.0 branches
IntegrationTestBulkLoad needs option to specify output folders used by test
Create test for cell level ACLs involving user group
Add back support for running ChaosMonkey as standalone tool
Fix test compilation error on building against htrace-3.2.0-incubating
Fix docs and site building on branch-1
book.pdf is not renamed during site build
Backport HBASE-7782 (HBaseTestingUtility.truncateTable() not acting like CLI) to branch-1.x
javadoc how Scan gets polluted when used; if you set attributes or ask for scan metrics
Backport HBASE-13917 (Remove string comparison to identify request priority) to release branches
Correct LICENSE and NOTICE files in artifacts
Upgrade asciidoctor plugin to v1.5.2.1
